thread.title: Diver reported missing in the Marlborough Sounds
thread.title_full: Diver reported missing in the Marlborough Sounds

author: JENNIFER EDER
title: Diver reported missing in the Marlborough Sounds
text:
Diver reported missing in the Marlborough Sounds JENNIFER EDER Last updated 11:31, February 25 2017 SCOTT HAMMOND/FAIRFAX NZ 
The Marlborough Coastguard is responding to reports of a missing diver in the Marlborough Sounds. 
A diver is missing in the Marlborough Sounds and emergency services are at the scene. 
The person was diving off a boat but was reported overdue about 10.20am on Saturday. 
Senior Sergeant Claire Robertson, of Tasman Police, said police were working with St John and Coastguard Marlborough to find the person. 
The conditions in the area were calm, she said. 
More to come.
